text: Evarkal pali cumattinarkalo, niccayamaka avarkalum unkalil oru kuttattinare! Anal atu unkalukkut tinku enru ninkal enna ventam. Atu unkalukku nanmaiyakum. (Pali cumattiyavarkal) ovvoru manitanukkum avan campatitta pavam (atarkoppa tantanai) irukkiratu melum, a(ppali camattiya)varkalil perum panketuttuk kontavanukkuk katinamana vetanaiyuntu
